title: Amy’s Neighbor Calls Her Out For Being Rude + Lunchbox Meets His Hero
itunes:title: Amy’s Neighbor Calls Her Out For Being Rude + Lunchbox Meets His Hero
description:
In today’s Mail Bag segment, Amy’s neighbor calls her out for being ‘rude.’ Also, Lunchbox brings in audio of him meeting his all-time hero.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
